하나님과 같이 될 것이다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='80' ry='80' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#glow)' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 15px 20px rgba(177,156,217,0.5))'/><path d='M 100 40 Q 120 60, 120 80 Q 120 100, 100 110 Q 80 100, 80 80 Q 80 60, 100 40 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='100' cy='65' r='25' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='90' cy='130' rx='40' ry='30' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.6' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 12px 18px rgba(255,228,181,0.4))'/><ellipse cx='110' cy='130' rx='40' ry='30' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.6' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 12px 18px rgba(255,228,181,0.4))'/><path d='M 70 50 Q 100 30, 130 50' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/></svg>
지혜롭게 할 만큼 탐스러워: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='70' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 25px rgba(200,230,201,0.5))'/><path d='M 100 50 Q 130 70, 130 100 Q 130 130, 100 150 Q 70 130, 70 100 Q 70 70, 100 50 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='90' rx='20' ry='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><ellipse cx='85' cy='105' rx='12' ry='10' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='115' cy='105' rx='12' ry='10' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M 60 80 Q 100 60, 140 80' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='4' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='35' fill='none' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.6'/></svg>
벗었다는 것: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='75' ry='85' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 20px 25px rgba(255,229,180,0.5))'/><path d='M 100 30 Q 140 60, 140 100 Q 140 140, 100 170 Q 60 140, 60 100 Q 60 60, 100 30 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='80' rx='30' ry='35' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 80 120 Q 100 110, 120 120 Q 100 130, 80 120 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.6'/><ellipse cx='85' cy='140' rx='15' ry='25' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='115' cy='140' rx='15' ry='25' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='50' fill='none' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#glow)'/></svg>
벗은, 나체의: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='3' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><rect x='30' y='30' width='140' height='140' rx='70' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 15px 22px rgba(225,245,254,0.5))'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='70' rx='35' ry='40' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='120' rx='40' ry='50' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M 70 110 Q 100 100, 130 110' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='80' cy='150' rx='20' ry='30' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.6' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 10px 15px rgba(255,212,229,0.4))'/><ellipse cx='120' cy='150' rx='20' ry='30' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.6' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 10px 15px rgba(255,212,229,0.4))'/></svg>
그리고 엮었다, 꿰매었다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='80' ry='70' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 23px rgba(200,230,201,0.5))'/><path d='M 50 100 Q 75 80, 100 100 Q 125 120, 150 100' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='4' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 50 80 Q 75 60, 100 80 Q 125 100, 150 80' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 50 120 Q 75 100, 100 120 Q 125 140, 150 120' stroke='#B4E7F4' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='50' cy='100' r='8' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='8' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='150' cy='100' r='8' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.9'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='60' rx='45' ry='25' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='140' rx='45' ry='25' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
네가: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='75' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 20px 25px rgba(255,212,229,0.5))'/><path d='M 100 40 L 130 80 L 115 80 L 115 140 L 85 140 L 85 80 L 70 80 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)' transform='rotate(0 100 100)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='160' rx='40' ry='20' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='100' cy='50' r='20' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 12px 18px rgba(255,229,180,0.4))'/><path d='M 60 100 Q 100 90, 140 100' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
내게 주었다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='70' ry='80' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 24px rgba(180,231,244,0.5))'/><path d='M 70 80 Q 100 60, 130 80 L 120 100 Q 100 90, 80 100 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='130' rx='50' ry='40' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 100 60 L 85 90 L 100 85 L 115 90 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 10px 15px rgba(255,249,196,0.4))'/><path d='M 60 110 Q 100 100, 140 110' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#glow)'/></svg>
너는 그의 발꿈치를 상하게 할 것이니라: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='110' rx='75' ry='85' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 20px 25px rgba(255,229,180,0.5))'/><path d='M 100 40 Q 80 70, 80 100 L 85 130 Q 90 150, 100 155 Q 110 150, 115 130 L 120 100 Q 120 70, 100 40 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='165' rx='35' ry='20' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 70 120 Q 85 130, 100 125 Q 115 130, 130 120' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='90' cy='170' r='10' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='110' cy='170' r='10' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='55' rx='25' ry='30' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
너는 흙이기 때문이다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><rect x='25' y='80' width='150' height='90' rx='45' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 25px rgba(200,230,201,0.5))'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='130' rx='60' ry='40' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='75' cy='120' r='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='100' cy='115' r='18' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='125' cy='120' r='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='155' rx='45' ry='20' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.6'/><path d='M 50 100 Q 100 85, 150 100' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='90' cy='140' r='8' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='110' cy='140' r='8' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
내가 네게 명령한: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='75' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 20px 25px rgba(225,190,231,0.5))'/><path d='M 100 50 L 140 90 L 120 90 L 120 130 L 80 130 L 80 90 L 60 90 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='145' rx='45' ry='25' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><rect x='75' y='95' width='50' height='8' rx='4' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><rect x='75' y='110' width='50' height='8' rx='4' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><rect x='75' y='125' width='50' height='8' rx='4' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 100 50 L 90 70 L 100 65 L 110 70 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.9' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 10px 15px rgba(180,231,244,0.4))'/></svg>
내가 벗었기 때문에: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='80' ry='75' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 24px rgba(225,245,254,0.5))'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='70' rx='35' ry='40' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 100 100 Q 75 110, 70 135 Q 70 150, 80 160 L 120 160 Q 130 150, 130 135 Q 125 110, 100 100 Z' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='85' cy='165' rx='18' ry='28' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='115' cy='165' rx='18' ry='28' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M 75 110 Q 100 105, 125 110' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='88' cy='75' r='6' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='112' cy='75' r='6' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/></svg>
선악을 아는 자: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='g4'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='80' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 20px 25px rgba(255,212,229,0.5))'/><circle cx='75' cy='100' r='45' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='125' cy='100' r='45' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 100 60 Q 80 80, 75 100 Q 80 120, 100 140 Q 120 120, 125 100 Q 120 80, 100 60 Z' fill='url(#g4)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='75' cy='100' rx='15' ry='20' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><ellipse cx='125' cy='100' rx='15' ry='20' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='25' fill='url(#g4)' opacity='0.8' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 12px 18px rgba(225,245,254,0.4))'/></svg>
그리고 따서: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='120' rx='70' ry='75' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 25px rgba(200,230,201,0.5))'/><circle cx='100' cy='110' r='50' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 100 50 Q 95 60, 100 70 Q 105 60, 100 50 Z' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 100 50 Q 110 45, 120 50 L 115 60 Q 107 57, 100 60 Z' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='75' cy='150' rx='25' ry='35' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='125' cy='150' rx='25' ry='35' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M 70 100 Q 100 95, 130 100' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='85' cy='115' r='8' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='115' cy='115' r='8' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/></svg>
그리고 회전하는 불칼을: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='g4'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='80' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 20px 25px rgba(255,229,180,0.5))'/><path d='M 100 30 Q 130 50, 140 80 Q 145 100, 140 120 Q 130 150, 100 170 Q 70 150, 60 120 Q 55 100, 60 80 Q 70 50, 100 30 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 100 50 L 115 100 L 100 95 L 85 100 Z' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9' transform='rotate(45 100 100)'/><path d='M 100 50 L 115 100 L 100 95 L 85 100 Z' fill='url(#g4)' opacity='0.8' transform='rotate(135 100 100)'/><path d='M 100 50 L 115 100 L 100 95 L 85 100 Z' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9' transform='rotate(225 100 100)'/><path d='M 100 50 L 115 100 L 100 95 L 85 100 Z' fill='url(#g4)' opacity='0.8' transform='rotate(315 100 100)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='20' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 12px 18px rgba(255,249,196,0.4))'/></svg>
들의 채소를: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><rect x='20' y='80' width='160' height='90' rx='45' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 24px rgba(200,230,201,0.5))'/><ellipse cx='70' cy='90' rx='20' ry='35' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='85' rx='22' ry='40' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='130' cy='90' rx='20' ry='35' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 70 120 Q 70 135, 75 145' stroke='#C8E6C9' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 100 120 Q 100 135, 105 145' stroke='#FFE5B4' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 130 120 Q 130 135, 135 145' stroke='#C8E6C9' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='155' rx='60' ry='20' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
나를 속였다, 꾀었다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='75' ry='80' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 20px 25px rgba(225,190,231,0.5))'/><path d='M 50 100 Q 70 70, 100 80 Q 130 70, 150 100 Q 130 130, 100 120 Q 70 130, 50 100 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 60 90 Q 100 60, 140 90' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='4' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 60 110 Q 100 140, 140 110' stroke='#B4E7F4' stroke-width='4' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='80' cy='95' rx='12' ry='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><ellipse cx='120' cy='95' rx='12' ry='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><path d='M 85 115 Q 100 125, 115 115' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/></svg>
우리가 먹는다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><circle cx='100' cy='110' r='75' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 24px rgba(255,229,180,0.5))'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='90' rx='50' ry='45' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 70 120 Q 100 135, 130 120 L 125 140 Q 100 150, 75 140 Z' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='85' cy='85' r='8' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='115' cy='85' r='8' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.9'/><path d='M 80 105 Q 100 115, 120 105' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='155' rx='40' ry='25' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='100' cy='60' r='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 10px 15px rgba(255,249,196,0.4))'/></svg>
너는 배로 다닐 것이다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='110' rx='80' ry='70' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 25px rgba(180,231,244,0.5))'/><path d='M 40 120 Q 60 100, 80 105 Q 100 110, 120 105 Q 140 100, 160 120 L 155 135 Q 140 125, 120 130 Q 100 135, 80 130 Q 60 125, 45 135 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='80' rx='35' ry='30' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 50 125 Q 100 115, 150 125' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='70' cy='145' rx='15' ry='10' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='147' rx='18' ry='12' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='130' cy='145' rx='15' ry='10' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='90' cy='75' r='6' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='110' cy='75' r='6' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.9'/></svg>
왜냐하면, ~때문에: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='75' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 20px 25px rgba(255,212,229,0.5))'/><path d='M 70 80 L 130 80 L 140 100 L 130 120 L 70 120 L 60 100 Z' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='35' ry='25' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 85 95 L 95 105 L 85 115' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 105 95 L 115 105 L 105 115' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='100' cy='140' r='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='100' cy='60' r='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
그가 손을 내밀까 하여: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='g3'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='glow'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='70' ry='80' fill='url(#g1)' opacity='0.7' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 18px 24px rgba(225,190,231,0.5))'/><ellipse cx='70' cy='90' rx='30' ry='35' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><path d='M 70 120 Q 90 125, 110 115 L 140 110 Q 150 115, 155 125 L 150 135 Q 145 130, 135 130 L 110 135 Q 85 145, 70 135 Z' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='145' cy='115' rx='12' ry='10' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='155' cy='125' rx='10' ry='8' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='148' cy='135' rx='8' ry='7' fill='url(#g2)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M 100 90 Q 120 85, 140 95' stroke='#FFD4E5' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow)'/><circle cx='70' cy='80' r='15' fill='url(#g3)' opacity='0.8' style='filter:drop-shadow(0px 12px 18px rgba(255,249,196,0.4))'/></svg>
